    A class to handle files stored on DS (Dauphine System)

    • Method Detail

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.String contents,
                    int mode)
        create a file in the file system the file will be create in the given path and will have the given contents. mode define the behavior when the file already exists: APPEND_MODE : append the contents OVERWRITE_MODE : overwrite the file IGNORE_MODE : ignore the operation
        Parameters:
        path -
        contents -
        mode -
